snippet.title: Medicare release and DATA Act signal major events in the age of data transparency
snippet.description: Alex Howard reports on a Medicare dataset made available online, and the DATA Act's passage in the Senate.

snippet.title: From textiles to tech: North Carolina's journey to becoming a startup epicenter
snippet.description: North Carolina's Research Triangle Park has led the charge in making the former textile state one of the top five startup epicenters in the US. But challenges remain.

snippet.title: Cloud Pricing Codex simplifies the confusing IaaS pricing landscape
snippet.description: Once upon a time, says Owen Rogers of 451 Research, cloud computing promised straightforward, on-demand pricing for resources. Things have become a little more complex.

snippet.title: 10 smartphone features that I'm pretty darn thankful for
snippet.description: In the spirit of the Thanksgiving holiday in the United States, Sonja Thompson lists 10 things about her smartphone that she's pretty darn thankful for.

snippet.title: How Israel is rewriting the future of cybersecurity and creating the next Silicon Valley
snippet.description: If you're looking for the rise the next Silicon Valley, the place to watch is the Negev region in Israel. Its new cybersecurity juggernaut is breaking new ground in public-private ...

snippet.title: Google Blogger in the Enterprise: Four tips
snippet.description: Blogs aren't dead, but their role is changing due to the emergence of social media tools.

snippet.title: .exe files coming through email from the DoD?
snippet.description: Hi! I have certain content blocked on my mail server, like .exe etc.. Typically what I try to do is review the header information, lookup sources based on ip's at http://cqcounte...

snippet.title: Hyper-V Recovery Manager on Windows Azure: Game changer in DR architecture
snippet.description: HVRM is a hybrid service that leverages the Azure public cloud and allows you to manage the replication of your primary data center to your disaster recovery (DR) site.

snippet.title: Tutorial: How to implement the parallax scrolling effect, part 1
snippet.description: Ryan Boudreaux explains the code behind achieving the parallax scrolling effect on your website. Part 1 of this two-part series covers the first two sections of code.

snippet.title: 10 mobile apps for tech pros: SF AppShow 2012 preview
snippet.description: Here's a preview of 10 apps showing at the SF Appshow, a showcase event for mobile technology in San Francisco.
